channel.title: Contents on Aaron's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Contents on Aaron's Blog

item.title: Gemini CLI Configuration
item.description: A note summarizing the configuration for the Gemini CLI. Includes the student workflow prompt and the PowerShell functions used to interact with the CLI.

item.title: Skylight App
item.description: Created a README. Migrated task and user models to asynchronous versions. Updated tabs. Streamlined database setup. Added placeholder tabs and a testing framework.

item.title: Gift Registry
item.description: Migrated data to Firestore and added email login. Refactored for Firebase v9. Set up Netlify deployment. Fixed CORS and Git push errors.

item.title: Night Audit Shift Wrap
item.description: Wrapped up the night audit shift. Reviewed Wireshark labs. Planned a Docker lesson.

item.title: Gemini CLI Setup Completed
item.description: Completed installation and configuration of Gemini CLI with PowerShell functions. Overcame CORS and database errors. Integrated the CLI into the study workflow.
